description.zh-cn: 中国富商于文斗之女，张学良的原配妻子。在张学良的人生中扮演了重要角色。
description.en: Daughter of Chinese businessman Yu Wendou and the original wife of Zhang Xueliang. She played a significant role in Zhang Xueliang's life.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将，奉系军阀首领张作霖之子，人称“少帅”。
description.en: A first-class general of the Republic of China Army, son of Fengtian clique leader Zhang Zuolin, known as the 'Young Marshal'.

description.zh-cn: 富商，于凤至的父亲。
description.en: A wealthy merchant, father of Yu Fengzhi.

description.zh-cn: 位于奉天（今沈阳）的一所女子师范学校，于凤至曾在此就读并毕业。
description.en: A women's normal school in Fengtian (modern-day Shenyang) where Yu Fengzhi studied and graduated.

description.zh-cn: 奉系军阀首领，北洋政府末代国家元首，张学良的父亲。
description.en: Leader of the Fengtian clique, the last head of state of the Beiyang Government, and father of Zhang Xueliang.

description.zh-cn: 张学良的秘书和第二任妻子。
description.en: Zhang Xueliang's secretary and second wife.

description.zh-cn: 日本关东军策划的针对张作霖的暗杀事件。
description.en: An assassination plot against Zhang Zuolin planned by the Japanese Kwantung Army.

description.zh-cn: 1871年至1945年期间的大日本帝国主要地面武装部队。
description.en: The main ground force of the Empire of Japan from 1871 to 1945.

description.zh-cn: 奉系军阀重要将领，后被张学良处决。
description.en: An important general of the Fengtian clique, later executed by Zhang Xueliang.

description.zh-cn: 奉系军阀高级官员，后被张学良处决。
description.en: A high-ranking official of the Fengtian clique, later executed by Zhang Xueliang.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代政治人物及军事家，曾任中华民国总统。在西安事变后长期囚禁张学良。
description.en: A modern Chinese political and military figure, former President of the Republic of China. He imprisoned Zhang Xueliang for a long period after the Xi'an Incident.

description.zh-cn: 蒋介石的妻子，中国近代政治人物。
description.en: Wife of Chiang Kai-shek, a modern Chinese political figure.

description.zh-cn: 宋嘉树的妻子，宋氏三姐妹的母亲，于凤至的干娘。
description.en: Wife of Song Jiashu, mother of the Soong sisters, and godmother to Yu Fengzhi.

description.zh-cn: 意大利王国总理，法西斯主义的创立者。
description.en: Prime Minister of the Kingdom of Italy and founder of Fascism.

description.zh-cn: 1861年至1946年期间的意大利国家。
description.en: The Italian state from 1861 to 1946.

description.zh-cn: 日本在中国东北地区建立的傀儡政权。
description.en: A puppet state established by Japan in Northeast China.

description.zh-cn: 意大利法西斯时期的外交部长，墨索里尼的女婿。
description.en: Foreign Minister of Fascist Italy and son-in-law of Mussolini.

description.zh-cn: 张学良和杨虎城为逼迫蒋介石抗日而发动的兵谏。
description.en: A military remonstrance initiated by Zhang Xueliang and Yang Hucheng to compel Chiang Kai-shek to resist Japan.

description.zh-cn: 世界三大宗教之一。
description.en: One of the world's three major religions.

description.zh-cn: 指一名男子在同一时间只与一名女子保持夫妻关系的婚姻制度，其教义成为张学良与于凤至离婚的借口。
description.en: A marital system where a man is married to only one woman at a time; its doctrine was used as a pretext for Zhang Xueliang's divorce from Yu Fengzhi.

description.zh-cn: 张学良与于凤至的长子。
description.en: The eldest son of Zhang Xueliang and Yu Fengzhi.

description.zh-cn: 张学良与于凤至的次子。
description.en: The second son of Zhang Xueliang and Yu Fengzhi.

description.zh-cn: 张学良与于凤至的三子。
description.en: The third son of Zhang Xueliang and Yu Fengzhi.

description.zh-cn: 张学良与于凤至的长女。
description.en: The eldest daughter of Zhang Xueliang and Yu Fengzhi.

description.zh-cn: 中国旧县名，位于今吉林省公主岭市境内，为于凤至的出生地。
description.en: A former county in China, located in present-day Gongzhuling, Jilin Province, and the birthplace of Yu Fengzhi.

description.zh-cn: 于凤至是张学良的原配妻子，两人于1916年结婚，1964年在蒋介石的压力下被迫离婚。
description.en: Yu Fengzhi was Zhang Xueliang's first wife. They married in 1916 and were forced to divorce in 1964 under pressure from Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 于凤至是富商于文斗的女儿。
description.en: Yu Fengzhi is the daughter of wealthy merchant Yu Wendou.

description.zh-cn: 于凤至于1913年考入奉天女子师范学校并以优异成绩毕业。
description.en: Yu Fengzhi was admitted to Fengtian Women's Normal School in 1913 and graduated with honors.

description.zh-cn: 于凤至出生于怀德县大泉眼村。
description.en: Yu Fengzhi was born in Daquanyan Village, Huaide County.

description.zh-cn: 张学良是张作霖的儿子。
description.en: Zhang Xueliang is the son of Zhang Zuolin.

description.zh-cn: 赵一荻自1929年起以秘书身份陪伴张学良，后成为其第二任妻子。
description.en: Zhao Yidi accompanied Zhang Xueliang as his secretary starting in 1929 and later became his second wife.

description.zh-cn: 于凤至起初不接纳赵一荻，后因赵的真诚和才智而对其产生好感，两人关系亲如姐妹。
description.en: Yu Fengzhi initially did not accept Zhao Yidi, but later grew fond of her due to her sincerity and intelligence, and their relationship became like that of sisters.

description.zh-cn: 日军策划并实施了皇姑屯事件，旨在暗杀张作霖。
description.en: The Japanese Army planned and executed the Huanggutun Incident to assassinate Zhang Zuolin.

description.zh-cn: 张作霖在皇姑屯事件中被日军炸死。
description.en: Zhang Zuolin was killed by a bomb planted by the Japanese Army in the Huanggutun Incident.

description.zh-cn: 在皇姑屯事件后，于凤至秘不发丧，巧妙周旋，帮助张学良顺利继承了在东北的军政大权。
description.en: After the Huanggutun Incident, Yu Fengzhi concealed the news of Zhang Zuolin's death and skillfully maneuvered, helping Zhang Xueliang smoothly inherit military and political power in the Northeast.

description.zh-cn: 为了稳固军权，张学良于1929年1月处决了奉系旧派代表杨宇霆。
description.en: To consolidate his military power, Zhang Xueliang executed Yang Yuting, a representative of the old guard of the Fengtian clique, in January 1929.

description.zh-cn: 为了稳固军权，张学良于1929年1月处决了奉系旧派代表常荫槐。
description.en: To consolidate his military power, Zhang Xueliang executed Chang Yinhuai, a representative of the old guard of the Fengtian clique, in January 1929.

description.zh-cn: 在张学良犹豫是否处置杨宇霆、常荫槐时，于凤至的意见使其下定决心处决二人。
description.en: When Zhang Xueliang hesitated whether to deal with Yang Yuting and Chang Yinhuai, Yu Fengzhi's opinion made him decide to execute them.

description.zh-cn: 于凤至于1930年与宋美龄会面，后结下姐妹情意。
description.en: Yu Fengzhi met Soong Mei-ling in 1930, and they later formed a sisterly bond.

description.zh-cn: 于凤至拜宋美龄之母倪桂珍为干娘。
description.en: Yu Fengzhi acknowledged Ni Guizhen, Soong Mei-ling's mother, as her godmother.

description.zh-cn: 1933年，于凤至随丈夫张学良出访意大利时会见了墨索里尼。
description.en: In 1933, Yu Fengzhi met Mussolini while visiting Italy with her husband Zhang Xueliang.

description.zh-cn: 1936年11月，意大利宣布承认满洲国成立。
description.en: In November 1936, Italy announced its recognition of the state of Manchukuo.

description.zh-cn: 因意大利承认满洲国，张家与时任意大利外交部长加莱亚佐·齐亚诺的私交破裂。
description.en: Due to Italy's recognition of Manchukuo, the personal relationship between the Zhang family and the then Italian Foreign Minister Galeazzo Ciano broke down.

description.zh-cn: 张学良是西安事变的主要发动者之一。
description.en: Zhang Xueliang was one of the main initiators of the Xi'an Incident.

description.zh-cn: 西安事变后，蒋介石将张学良长期扣押囚禁。
description.en: After the Xi'an Incident, Chiang Kai-shek detained and imprisoned Zhang Xueliang for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 以张学良皈依基督教需遵守一夫一妻制为由，逼迫其与于凤至离婚。
description.en: Using Zhang Xueliang's conversion to Christianity and the doctrine of monogamy as a pretext, he forced him to divorce Yu Fengzhi.
